mapper.select: select rugstoreId, drugstoreName, supplierId, skullId, warehouseId, unit, tradePrice, sellingPrice, area, type, produceDate, validDate, drugstorenum, batch from drugstore where rugstoreId = #{rugstoreid}
mapper.insert: insert into drugstore(drugstoreName, supplierId, skullId, warehouseId, unit, tradePrice, sellingPrice, area, type, produceDate, validDate, drugstorenum, batch) values (#{drugstorename}, #{supplierid}, #{skullid}, #{warehouseid}, #{unit}, #{tradeprice}, #{sellingprice}, #{area}, #{type}, #{producedate}, #{validdate}, #{drugstorenum}, #{batch})

insert into drugstore(drugstoreName, supplierId, skullId, warehouseId, unit, tradePrice, sellingPrice, area, type, produceDate, validDate, drugstorenum, batch) values
(#{entity.drugstorename}, #{entity.supplierid}, #{entity.skullid}, #{entity.warehouseid}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.tradeprice}, #{entity.sellingprice}, #{entity.area}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.producedate}, #{entity.validdate}, #{entity.drugstorenum}, #{entity.batch})

insert into drugstore(drugstoreName, supplierId, skullId, warehouseId, unit, tradePrice, sellingPrice, area, type, produceDate, validDate, drugstorenum, batch) values
(#{entity.drugstorename}, #{entity.supplierid}, #{entity.skullid}, #{entity.warehouseid}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.tradeprice}, #{entity.sellingprice}, #{entity.area}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.producedate}, #{entity.validdate}, #{entity.drugstorenum}, #{entity.batch})
on duplicate key update drugstoreName = values(drugstoreName), supplierId = values(supplierId), skullId = values(skullId), warehouseId = values(warehouseId), unit = values(unit), tradePrice = values(tradePrice), sellingPrice = values(sellingPrice), area = values(area), type = values(type), produceDate = values(produceDate), validDate = values(validDate), drugstorenum = values(drugstorenum), batch = values(batch)
mapper.update:
update drugstore
drugstoreName = #{drugstorename},
supplierId = #{supplierid},
skullId = #{skullid},
warehouseId = #{warehouseid},
unit = #{unit},
tradePrice = #{tradeprice},
sellingPrice = #{sellingprice},
area = #{area},
type = #{type},
produceDate = #{producedate},
validDate = #{validdate},
drugstorenum = #{drugstorenum},
batch = #{batch},
where rugstoreId = #{rugstoreid}
